name: Reggie's Quarantine Game
description:
Full-screen cautiously recommended.

It's 2025, you're still in quarantine, and things are getting weird. One morning a note is passed under your door, and, after the disinfection procedure, you read it. "Reggie", a neighbor you've never met, is holding a competition to create the greatest collection of all. Welp, you haven't got much else to do. 

Scavenge items, talk and trade with your neighbors, and form the greatest collection ever. You only have seven days to finish (note: we didn't program the ending. You can keep playing. It will eventually break. But you can have up to 4 chats with each character and they're fun folks.)

Amanda Rivera Stahlschmidt - Art  // Website //  Itch.io  //
